universum.studios.android.device.battery

Interface Battery.OnPluggedStateListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    Battery

    public static interface Battery.OnPluggedStateListener
    Listener that may be used to receive callback with info about changed battery's plugged state.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPluggedToPowerSource(Context context, Battery battery)
      Invoked whenever the battery has been plugged into some power source.
      void onUnpluggedFromPowerSource(Context context, Battery battery)
      Invoked whenever the battery has been unplugged from power source.

    • Method Detail

      • onPluggedToPowerSource

        void onPluggedToPowerSource(@NonNull
                            Context context,
                            @NonNull
                            Battery battery)
        Invoked whenever the battery has been plugged into some power source. The current plugged state may be obtained via Battery.getPluggedState().

        Note, that there need to be registered BatteryPluggedStateReceiver via Battery.registerBatteryReceiver(Context, int) with Battery.RECEIVER_BATTERY_PLUGGED_STATE to receive this callback.

        Parameters:
        context - Current application context.
        battery - Battery with the actual data.

      • onUnpluggedFromPowerSource

        void onUnpluggedFromPowerSource(@NonNull
                                Context context,
                                @NonNull
                                Battery battery)
        Invoked whenever the battery has been unplugged from power source.

        Note, that there need to be registered BatteryPluggedStateReceiver via Battery.registerBatteryReceiver(Context, int) with Battery.RECEIVER_BATTERY_PLUGGED_STATE to receive this callback.

        Parameters:
        context - Current application context.
        battery - Battery with the actual data.
